column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////After sampling bakeries and hot dog stands and other Chicago Institutions all day
column2: we just werent hungry enough for a big dinner
column3: but not stuffed enough to just call it a night
column4: so Cafe BBR was the perfect answer.  They have a huge menu of lots of tapas (in fact
column5: the whole menu is tapas) and all of them except for the octopus were great
column8: were outstanding.  The 520 reviews and 4 star rating made me expect something a little more unique and unbelievable
column9: but the food was all really good
column10: and they have a comfortable enclosed patio
column11: so I was pretty happy overall.  Just dont go expecting a once in a lifetime experience.
